page.title: 09 R.S.R.E.
page.content: The{RSRE}was built in{1946}and since then it has grown immensely .There are about{12 000}people working there they have to have{4}to{5'O'levels}or a degree. Research and development is very common at{RSRE,}scientists have researched the manufacture of{ {telecommunications ,radar}and have measured length of speech in a high noise room .Discoveries in{RSRE include{Quartz watches}and heat sensitive cameras which detect body heat. { RSRE}was moved to{Malvern}from the costal regions of{Great Britain}to be safe from the{Germans.RSRE}has had many{Royal}visits from the{Queen,The {Duke of Edinburgh}and{The Duke of {Kent}.
